duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage certificates of insurance documents and process.
Assist with the client onboarding process.
Answer phones and take detailed messages.
Update and maintain office policies and procedures.
Order marketing materials, recycling program items, and other supplies.
Assist with the planning and coordination of office events.
Provide general administrative support to team.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma required. College education preferred. Environmental or sustainability courses taken preferred.
